answers: Hi there! Type "clear" to reset the chat bot.
Sorry to hear, perhaps open a GitHub issue with your concern?
Oh sorry about that, I wish I was smarter.
Sorry to hear that. Perhaps type "help" to see some examples?
Thank you. We try our best :-)
Great! Check out https://fabilab.org to see what else we do.
The video tutorials are available at https://www.youtube.com/@AtlasapproxFabilab

regex: /(?:dotplot of|sequence of|sequences of|expression of|cells expressing) ((these genes|these features|this gene|this feature)|([\w;:,./-]+))/i
/(?:genes similar to|genes most similar to|genes like|similar genes to) ([\w;:,./-]+)/i
/(?:peaks similar to|peaks most similar to|peaks like|similar peaks to) ([\w;:,./-]+)/i

/(?:expresses|express|expresses most|express most|expressor of|expressors of|expressing)(?:(?! the| interaction| interactor| partner)) ((these genes|these features|this gene|this feature)|([\w;,./-]+))/i
/(?:are|are genes|are the genes|are features|are the features|is|is the gene|is the feature) ([\w;:,./-]+) (?:present|found) in/i
/but (?:lacks |does not express |do not express |does not have |do not have|does not contain |do not contain |is missing )([\w;,./-]+)/i
/(?:where are|where were|organs contain|organs containing|organs that have|organs with|locations of|location of) (\w+|\w+ \w+|\w+ \w+ \w+)(?:$| detected| found| in| across)/i
